entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 04:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 38 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Freezing rain inland. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 02:50 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 02:50 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 02:50 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
